short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Professional time tracking for your browsing habits

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Site Time Tracker Google Chrome extension is a productivity tool designed to monitor and manage the time you spend on various websites. It runs seamlessly in the background, tracking your browsing habits to provide detailed reports and insights into where your time goes online.

Time well tracked, productivity unlocked.
